mapper.select:
select '全年度' title, '单位：万元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
trunc(sum(t.income_amount)/10000, 2) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) reportDate from sys_income t, sys_user s where t.user_id = s.user_id
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4))

select #{reportValue} || '年' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.income_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) reportDate from sys_income t, sys_user s where t.user_id = s.user_id and substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4) = #{reportValue}
and t.user_id = #{userId}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.income_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2))

select '全年度' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.gift_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) reportDate from sys_gift t, sys_user s where 1=1
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(t.gift_sender, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(t.gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(gift_sender, '-') + 1) = #{giftSender}
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = #{giftReceiver}
group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4))

select #{reportValue} || '年' title, '单位：元' subTitle,
s.user_name reportName,
sum(t.gift_amount) reportNum, to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) reportDate from sys_gift t, sys_user s where 1=1
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(t.gift_sender, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(t.gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = s.user_id
and substr(t.gift_sender, instr(gift_sender, '-') + 1) = #{giftSender}
and substr(t.gift_receiver, instr(gift_receiver, '-') + 1) = #{giftReceiver}
and substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 1, 4) = #{reportValue} group by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2)) order by
s.user_name,
to_number(substr(to_char(t.gift_date, 'yyyyMMdd'), 5, 2))
